mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members(id, pw, name, phone, email, zipcode, address1, address2) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM members WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT count(*) FROM members WHERE id = #{id} AND pw = #{pw}
mapper.update: UPDATE members SET phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2} WHERE id = #{id}
